data.title: Daily Star Negative Collection
data.meta_description: Southeastern > Academics > Academic Programs > The Center for Southeast Louisiana Studies > Historical
data.text:
This collection contains photo negatives from the Hammond Daily Star from 1966 to

2005. The envelope descriptions were copied exactly from the original Daily Star descriptions.

The collection includes numerous negatives on sport events (local high school and

universities), religious organizations, KKK rallies, political leaders and events,

agricultural achievements, community club events and development of towns, streets,

and highways. The collection includes frequently includes negatives relating to events

in Hammond, Ponchatoula, Amite, Loranger, Kentwood, Springfield, Madisonville, Albany,

Denham Springs, New Orleans, Independence, Natalbany, and Livingston.
